response.overview: White Porcelain - A contemporary chamber piece based on Ernest Hemingway's short story "Mountains of White Elephants." The reunion of two young women, Klarissza and Hanna, slowly intensifies into a power struggle: passwords, music, and a sparkling white powder steer the conversation toward the unspeakable. The film examines the fragility of consent and the limits of self-determination in a clean space, building on glances and rhythm.
response.title: Fehér porcelán
